item.title: Writer Monads
item.description: This is actually one of the very first GitHub tickets I’ve opened. I tend read medium articles on my daily commute to work and I always see articles on the Writer Monad (along other monad instances I plan to write about). I did not use to read them because they’re topics I do not understand but I’ve been meaning to learn about them for a while now… And so here is goes:
